Package io.tweetninja.cli.Types

Class Aside

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tweetninja.cli.Types.Aside
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProfileAside, ProfileSubAside, ProxyAside, ProxySubAside, RickAside
    public abstract class Aside
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that facilitates "asides", which are tangents that can be taken which block the console for a short time. Only one aside can be focused at a time, so there is a constant juggling between them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Aside.UnfocusedException
      A generic exception that occurs when input is requested from and unfocused aside.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.util.UUID identifier
      Uniquely identifies this aside so that the hypervisor can tell whether or not this aside is focused.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​Aside> registry

        public final java.util.UUID identifier

    • Method Detail

      • clearFocus

        public static void clearFocus()
        Unfocuses all asides.

      • setDebug

        public static void setDebug​(boolean _debug)
        Enables or disables debug logging. If true, whenever an error occurs in an aside, the hypervisor also prints a stack trace.
        Parameters:
        _debug - Whether or not debug mode should be on.

      • call

        public final void call​(java.lang.Runnable callback)
        Call this to start the Aside.
        Parameters:
        callback - Runs this when the aside has finished execution.

      • readLine

        protected final java.lang.String readLine()
                                   throws Aside.UnfocusedException
        Reads a line from the console. This is recommended over Console.readLine() since that ignores Aside rules.
        Returns:
        The string read from console.
        Throws:
        Aside.UnfocusedException - This aside was not focused when a line was attempted to be read.

      • readLineInt

        protected final int readLineInt()
                         throws Aside.UnfocusedException
        Reads a line from the console, and parses it as an integer. This is recommended over Console.readLine() since that ignores Aside rules.
        Returns:
        The integer read from console.
        Throws:
        Aside.UnfocusedException - This aside was not focused when a line was attempted to be read.

      • focus

        protected final void focus()
        Forces this aside into focus. Only do this if you know what you're doing.

      • recall

        protected final void recall()
        Calls this aside again, with the same callback as it was last called with.

      • onCall

        protected void onCall()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        An internal function. Do NOT call this yourself. All subclasses of Aside should override this function with their own operations.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any exception the method decided to throw.

      • equals

        public final boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this Aside with another by identifier.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The other object to compare to.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the objects are equal.
